tv.generator-info-name: Original XML Generated with Tempest EPG Generator (made by Kvanc) - Processed by Open-EPG Visual Processor v0.9

programme.title: Labor In Power
programme.desc: This program analyses their rise to power, the actual disharmony between then and the economic changes resulting from their policies including deregulation of banking.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.desc: Hannah explores a perennial paradise, Sophie and Costa find horticultural gems at the show, Tammy mounts orchids onto a feature log, Jerry visits an internal courtyard and we meet a ceramic artist inspired by the bush.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings
programme.desc: Stay in the know with whats happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Pilgrimage: The Road Through The Alps
programme.desc: Seven celebrities of differing faiths and beliefs take on a pilgrimage through the Austrian and Swiss Alps to Einsiedeln Abbey, a pilgrim destination for over a thousand years.

programme.title: Media Watch
programme.desc: Skys latest opinion show Freya Fires Up self-combusts after a controversial bacon incident. Nine Radios silence on a scandal involving a key advertiser. Plus Spoof Goof: Planet America mistakes a comedy video for news.

programme.title: Anhs Brush With Fame
programme.desc: Kate Ritchie grew up in front of the nation. She was cast as Sally on Home and Away and played the role for two decades, with her own experiences reflected in her character. Anh must capture her warmth and authenticity.

programme.title: Spicks And Specks
programme.sub-title: Astrid Jorgensen, Zoe Coombs Marr, Anthony Albanese and Ben Lee
programme.desc: Adam, Myf and Alan are joined by Astrid Jorgensen, Zoe Coombs Marr, Ben Lee and part-time DJ but full-time Prime Minister, Anthony Albanese. Therell be questions, a massive singalong and a peek into Ethel Chops Op Shop.

programme.title: ABC News
programme.desc: News from where we live. ABC News NSW brings you the days top stories, exclusive investigations and original reporting on the issues that matter to you. Presented by Jeremy Fernandez.

programme.title: Hard Quiz
programme.desc: Tom Gleeson dishes out the points and the putdowns as four experts vie for the Big Brass Mug. Tonights topics are Vanderpump Rules, Martin Scorsese, insulators, and composer Chopin. Play along at home!

programme.title: The Assembly
programme.desc: The Assembly, a collective of Autistic journalism students mentored by Leigh Sales, interviews Australian music phenomenon, Guy Sebastian.

programme.title: The Business
programme.desc: October 1 marks the start of the federal governments expanded First Home Guarantee scheme, which removes income eligibility limits, increases property price caps, and allows first home buyers to purchase with a 5% deposit.

programme.title: You Cant Ask That
programme.desc: What is it actually like to put your hand up, be elected and serve the nation in the House of Representatives or the Senate? Eight former politicians go off-script and share their candid opinions.

programme.title: Parkinson In Australia
programme.sub-title: 1981: Barry Humphries, Barry Jones, The Watsons, Jacki Weaver
programme.desc: Revisit 1981 as Michael Parkinson interviews guests Barry Humphries, Barry Jones, The Watsons and Jacki Weaver.

Sarah Ferguson presents Australias premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus analysis from 7.30s Political Editor Jacob Greber.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings
programme.desc: Stay in the know with whats happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Melissa Mackay.

programme.title: Back Roads
programme.desc: Back Roads heads to Tambo, an outback town famous for teddies and chicken racing. Guest presenter, Tom Forrest finds a community thats not afraid to take risks to keep this historic town thriving.

programme.title: If Youre Listening
programme.sub-title: What are Trumps Plans in Venezuela?
programme.desc: Why is the US military taking pot-shots at speedboats off the coast of Venezuela? Its actually follows a playbook theyve used before. So what happened last time, and should Venezuelas Nicolas Maduro be watching his back?

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: The death of an investigative journalist throws the spotlight onto Sam Ryan. Nikki begins to realise that the implications of her discoveries will challenge the principles of forensic science.

programme.title: Spicks And Specks
programme.sub-title: Angie Mcmahon, Mel Tracina, Jason Arrow and Hamish Blake
programme.desc: Will Hamish Blake replace Jason Arrow in Hamilton? Will Adam and Angie McMahon recite every Meatloaf lyric? Will Mel Tracina convince Alan she knows the secret song? Will Myf have to sing the whole song to work out the title?

programme.title: ABC News
programme.desc: News from where we live. ABC News NSW brings you the days top stories, exclusive investigations and original reporting on the issues that matter to you. Presented by Jeremy Fernandez.

programme.title: Back Roads
programme.desc: Kristy OBrien ventures to the tiny South Australian town of Lucindale, discovering a small community playing a big role in keeping the most colourful bush traditions alive.

programme.title: Mystery Road: Origin
programme.desc: Jay is frustrated at Simmos stance that Sister Kerrys death was an accident. Jays brother Sputty is implicated in a murder. No closer to finding Scarlett, Jay has a suspect in his crosshairs.

programme.title: The Business
programme.desc: Australias leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, investors, employees and businesses big and small. Presented by David Chau.

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.sub-title: Top Animal Crossing Islands and Monkey Barrels
programme.desc: We visit the top dream destinations in Animal Crossing New Horizons, plus we review the explosive and colourful twin stick shooting mayhem of Monkey Barrels!

programme.title: Miraculous World: New York, United Heroez
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Burgled Bags
programme.desc: During a school field trip, Ladybug and Cat Noir meet the American superheroes, whom they have to save from an akumatised super-villain. They discover that Miraculous exist in the United States too.

programme.title: ABC Family Programs Resume At 7.30pm
programme.desc: ABC Family programs resume at 7:30pm.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: Bitzer glues the Farmers broken glasses back together - but when the Flock get their hooves on the tube of glue, things start to get very sticky.

programme.title: Fresh Off The Boat
programme.desc: Louis and Jessica learn that Emery has the potential to be the next Asian-American tennis superstar. They hire tennis legend Billie Jean King to take Emery to the next level, but fear she may be taking the training too far.

programme.title: Merlin
programme.desc: A knight with a shield of magical snakes arrives in Camelot with one mission: to kill Arthur.

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.sub-title: How To Learn A Language With Games and Aground
programme.desc: This week on GGSP: We find out how games can help us learn a language, plus we go digging through the 2D Sandbox adventure of Aground!

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: Panda is an avid e-dater and when a lovely French woman matches with him and agrees to a video chat date. Panda and his brothers engineer the situation so Panda is able to show the best side of himself.

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug And Cat Noir
programme.desc: Marinettes friends get akumatized into the Gang of Secrets, a team of supervillains determined to save her...whether she wants it or not! Will her secrets resist them?

programme.title: ABC Kids Programs Resume At 4am
programme.desc: ABC Kids programs resume at 4.00am

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.sub-title: If You Cant Stand The Heat
programme.desc: It is a scorching hot day, and the Flock are desperate to cool down in the Sheep Dip. Theres only one thing in their way: the sun-bathing Farmer...

programme.title: Widows
programme.desc: When four armed robbers are killed in a failed heist attempt, their widows - with nothing in common except a debt left by their dead husbands criminal activities - take fate into their own hands.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: The Doctors choose some of their favourite moments including an experiment to find out what happens when you cough and a life-changing operation that allows someone to hear for the very first time.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.sub-title: To The Promised Resort! Vegeta Takes A Family Trip!
programme.desc: While Goku gets to spend his time training on King Kais planet, Vegeta is on a family vacation! But this brooding prince would rather spend his time getting stronger than on bonding.

programme.title: Space Nova
programme.desc: The Nova kids, G9, Sol and Ulan crash land on two separate planets, testing their survival skills.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls
programme.desc: The Powerpuff Girls have to find a way to save Donny the Unicorn before its too late!

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: The Titans speak Pig Latin to stop Robin from eavesdropping.

programme.title: George Clarkes Old House New Home
programme.desc: In Weymouth, George helps a couple whose first-time family home was destroyed by a flash flood. Plus, George is back in Chiswick to help a couple whose master bedroom and bathroom he redesigned a couple of years ago.

programme.title: Spooks
programme.desc: Adam comes face-to-face with a spy who betrayed him in his MI6 days. Should he trust the man who sold him out?

programme.title: rage Vault: Tony Van Den Ende
programme.desc: rage dives into the Vault and lines up clips directed by Tony Van Den Ende, from Flock Of Seagulls to Simply Red, Transvision Vamp, Thomas Dolby, Kim Wilde and more.

programme.title: ABC News Update
programme.desc: The headlines from ABC News, updating you on the days top stories from across Australia and around the world.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: Dr Chris and Dr Xand take a look at what happens to your body and why, when you reach puberty. Dr Xand finds out why you sweat more and Dr Chris discovers the real reason teens dont want to get up in the morning.

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.sub-title: Where Does The Dream Pick Up? Find The Super Saiyan God!
programme.desc: Beerus works to find the unbeatable foe in his dream while Supreme Kai tries to keep information about Beerus from Goku. Unfortunately, Beerus is already planning to visit the Saiyan and test his strength.

programme.title: Space Nova
programme.desc: A pod of intergalactic Whalia endangers everyone at the gravball final - and Jet discovers hes responsible!

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls
programme.desc: Buttercup meets an old woman who claims she used to be a superhero.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin is inspired after seeing cool dudes on rollerblades.

programme.title: George Clarkes Old House New Home
programme.desc: George is in Manchester to drag an Arts and Crafts-inspired Edwardian home into the modern day. He also meets Flo, a first-time buyer in London, whose 1930s flat needs a rejig to make it the sociable space shes longing for.

programme.title: Hard Quiz
programme.desc: Tom Gleeson dishes out the points and the putdowns as four experts vie for the Big Brass Mug. Tonights topics are Vanderpump Rules, Martin Scorsese, insulators, and composer Chopin. Play along at home!

programme.title: Planet America
programme.desc: Trump warns "there will be others" after the indictment of ex-FBI chief Comey. An update on the Epstein files as Dems release new evidence. Plus Kimmel returns to late-night TV as NYC Mayor Eric Adams slips out the side door.

programme.title: Moon And Me
programme.desc: Inside the Little Toy House, Colly Wobble discovers a toy suitcase. In Storyland, Colly Wobble decides to take her suitcase on a journey far away.

programme.title: Beep And Mort
programme.desc: On the way to a picnic with Mort, Beep becomes mesmerised by her own reflection and thinks she has found her new best friend. But as the sun sets, Beep realises that Mort is the best friend she could ask for.

programme.title: Hoopla Doopla!
programme.desc: On his birthday, Zap decides to deliver his parcels quickly by going down his slide with all the parcels. With so many parcels Zap gets stuck. His friends must come to the rescue so his birthday party will be saved.

programme.title: The Sound Collector
programme.desc: The Sound Collector heads to the beach, maybe its a bit cold for a picnic today though!

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and Flop are making ginger biscuits for Charlie and Coco. But when Charlie and Coco arrive Charlies done a poo and in all the fuss cleaning him up, nobody hears the timer ring to tell them that the biscuits are cooked.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mummy Pig tells Peppa and George that bottles dont go in the bin, they go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box. Peppa and George have fun filling the boxes.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: Shaun and the Flock discover that the Farmer has grand plans for their barn - that dont include them! Drastic action is needed if life on the farm is ever going to be the same again!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: The Why Files (Norman and Hannah) investigate a mystery involving spilled milk, a half-eaten sausage roll, and strange dog like footprints...

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Queen Thistle reads the children a story about the stars, and they all wonder where the stars go in the daytime. They cant find the answer in the magic books, so go instead to the Wise Old Elf in the Great Elf Library.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are pretending to hold babies while Mummy and Daddy Pig look after Evie. They ask if Peppa wants to hold Evie, but Peppa decides to practice first.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: Gemma hosts a No Sleep Sleepover full of fun and games, but can the tired cadets make it until midnight?

programme.title: Super Monsters
programme.desc: The Super Monsters bring classic stories to life, teaching teamwork and creativity.

programme.title: Nikhil and Jay
programme.sub-title: Nikhil and Jay and the Deepavali Fireworks
programme.desc: Nikhil and Jay celebrate Deepavali (Diwali) with their family, with kolam, laddus and bunting. But will they be able to watch the fireworks without scaring Max the Cat?

programme.title: Ready Eddie Go!
programme.desc: Baking a chocolate cake means a trip to the supermarket, where Eddie navigates the smells and sounds of the big shop.

programme.title: Play School Science Time
programme.desc: What is a chain reaction? Luke is testing a chain reaction experiment with musical chimes to create a Magnificent Music Machine! Tune and chime on in to see if the machine is a scientific success!

programme.title: Ready, Steady, Wiggle!
programme.desc: Get ready to sing along with Simon. Hes creating a brand-new rhyming song and, with help from his Wiggly friends, finds the perfect words to make a mighty tune!

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: The Alphablocks make a most wonderful thing - but what exactly is it? This episode introduces the letter team TH and the words thing, this, that, thick, thin and them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppas playgroup to show the children her pets.

programme.title: Tish Tash
programme.desc: Rosa is in her studio struggling with her latest painting for a diaper advert and is getting frustrated. Tish offers to help her along with the help of Tash.

programme.title: Vida The Vet
programme.desc: Sunny suddenly refuses to see the Sweetwood Band. Vida discovers he needs earmuffs for the show!

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Stanley gathers the townsfolk to watch Myrtles new dance.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: Gemma hosts a No Sleep Sleepover full of fun and games, but can the tired cadets make it until midnight?

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Emily worries she doesnt have a best friend, but, when the other engines help her out of a tricky situation, she realises shes been surrounded by best friends all along.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: Tammy and the junior gardeners plant a pizza shaped herb garden to create the ultimate pizzas!

programme.title: Ready, Steady, Wiggle!
programme.desc: Join Captain Feathersword and The Wiggles for an exciting pirate dance adventure! After that, the fun continues its time to put on your tap shoes and get ready for the Wiggly World of Dance.

programme.title: Ariel
programme.desc: Triton accidentally turns into a kid.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mummy Pig gives Granny and Grandpa Pig her old computer to work and play on.

programme.title: Octonauts: Above And Beyond
programme.desc: A rainy season storm in the West African Savanna interests Paani, until a mudslide sends Tunip and the Terra-Gup 1 tumbling into a ditch. Luckily, a mysterious nocturnal creature, a pangolin, helps with the rescue.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: At the weekend, Bluey and Bingo are playing in the garden with Dad. But Bingo gets upset when she discovers a walking leaf insect and Dad is too caught up in the game to notice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: One of the chickens is laying her eggs. The chicks legs pop out of the bottom of the egg. Oh dear its a little bit stuck! Wait a minute...the egg is running off! Can the squirrels help bring it back to the chicken safely?

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Chilli says hes a great skateboarder, but when Supertato needs his help to catch Evil Pea, Chilli cant skateboard at all! Carrot, Chilli and Supertato create a chilli rocket to defeat Evil Pea.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Dad and Uncle Stripe play a game of squash, Bluey and Bingo are in control of their every move, and Bingo proves that big siblings dont always beat little siblings.

programme.title: Moon And Me
programme.desc: Inside the Little Toy House, everybody is surprised to discover the Roundabout has been left in the sitting room. In Storyland, Little Nana and Lambkin go flying in the aeroplane.

programme.title: Beep And Mort
programme.sub-title: Too Much Of A Good Swing
programme.desc: When Uncle Joe hogs the new swing set, Mort invents a ride that the villagers can all use together. They find the best kind of fun is the type you have with your friends.

programme.title: Hoopla Doopla!
programme.desc: The first tomato of the season is so delicious that Squidgie grows more and more and more until her friends are sick of eating them. No one wants to tell Squidgie because they dont want to hurt her feelings.

programme.title: The Sound Collector
programme.desc: The Sound Collector is ready for a night of sounds, what will he find?

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and Pando experiment with Bings toy train in the playground. The train is good at going over bridges and at going down the slide. But when Bing slides it off the roof of the play house, the train crashes and breaks.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa, her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat to play with except Rebecca Rabbit. Daddy Pig makes Rebecca a very special paper boat out of newspaper.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: The Flock and the Pigs are playing a high-spirited game of rounders. Shaun steps up to the plate - will he score the winning run? Will the Pigs foul-play prevent victory? Or will the Farmer discover what theyre up to?

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: When Joe struggles to get the hang of his drone display for Station Officer Steeles anniversary party, he accidentally starts a huge fire!

programme.title: Ben And Hollys Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Ben and Holly meet a new friend, Betty Caterpillar, but she is sad that she cant join in their games because she cant fly.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa, George and Freddy Fox are out with Grandpa on his boat. They are playing pirates. Police Officers Panda and Police Officer Squirrel are in their Police Boat. The children get to go on the police boat.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: Frizzy gets herself in trouble when she cries shark. Then when she spots real danger headed for Kangaroo Beach, no one believes her.

programme.title: Super Monsters
programme.desc: Zoe learns to embrace her own strengths and celebrate her brothers talents with help from the Super Monsters.

programme.title: Nikhil and Jay
programme.sub-title: Nikhil and Jay and the Butterflies
programme.desc: When Nikhil sets out on a mission to spot butterflies, hes determined to do it alone. Will Jays butterfly fairy magic get in the way or help Nikhil after all?

programme.title: Ready Eddie Go!
programme.desc: Gardening club at school for Eddie. How long does it take for the magic to happen, and how can he make sure he does the best for his plants?

programme.title: Play School Science Time
programme.desc: What are curds and whey anyway? Rachael is mixing and experimenting with milk and vinegar to make curds and whey. Discover your whey and learn how the soft mixture can harden into moulds that you can paint and decorate!

programme.title: Ready, Steady, Wiggle!
programme.desc: Lachy and Anthony, together with Lucia and Wags the Dog, are going on a camping trip! Join them for this outdoor adventure complete with a tent, fishing, camping songs, and even a spooky story?

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: The Alphablocks are going on holiday but their train gets stuck on the tracks. How will they get there? This episode introduces the AI letter team and the words rail, rain, train, wait, chain, fail and sail.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mummy Pig gives Granny and Grandpa Pig her old computer to work and play on.

programme.title: Tish Tash
programme.desc: Stuck indoors for the day, Tish and Bobby play a board game, Snakes and Ladders. Tish is winning however, so Bobby starts to cheat a little. Annoyed, Bobby storms off when Tish corrects him.

programme.title: Vida The Vet
programme.desc: Ottos stinky feet smell like cheese. Vida helps and everyone is happy except Sunny, who loves cheese!

programme.title: Stan Can
programme.desc: Stanley covers Jose at the shop and ends up making too much popcorn.

programme.title: Kangaroo Beach
programme.desc: Frizzy gets herself in trouble when she cries shark. Then when she spots real danger headed for Kangaroo Beach, no one believes her.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Thomas discovers a missing dog on the railway and tries to find it a new home.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: Costa and the junior gardeners get "buzzy" making hotels for native bees in the garden.

programme.title: Ready, Steady, Wiggle!
programme.desc: Count along to One, Two, Three, Four, Five, and join the fun! Paloma the Mermaid is visiting today but Lucia, Simon, and Lachy have lost their Wiggle. Can Tsehay help them find it before she arrives?

programme.title: Ariel
programme.desc: Ariel tells a tall mer-tale.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her Rescue Helicopter!

programme.title: Octonauts: Above And Beyond
programme.desc: While on a mission to clean up a forest, Min and the Octonauts discover a hollow, dried-out tree thats inhabited by all kinds of creatures. When the tree becomes threatened, the Octonauts must move it!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Its lunchtime on Blueys back deck! But every BBQ needs a side salad, so Bingos relaxing sit-down will have to wait until she finds every colour of capsicum her cousins asked for!

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggees nephew Dudley comes to stay. Hes one cute puppy, but he looks like he could cause chaos in the clubhouse. The Squirrels come up with lots of imaginative ways to entertain him!

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Evil Pea captures Supertato, but Carrot finally masters the ultimate flip kick and rescues her.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: During a game of hairdressers, Bluey discovers that big-headed customer Dad has nits! To help treat them Bingo has to find her voice, while Bluey has to find her ears.

programme.title: Labor In Power
programme.desc: This program analyses their rise to power, the actual disharmony between then and the economic changes resulting from their policies including deregulation of banking.

programme.desc: Trump warns "there will be others" after the indictment of ex-FBI chief Comey. An update on the Epstein files as Dems release new evidence. Plus Kimmel returns to late-night TV as NYC Mayor Eric Adams slips out the side door.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent
programme.desc: An uneasy calm has returned to Iran. In June, the country was in the grip of a 12-day war as Israel targeted Irans nuclear facilities. Jonathan Miller is in the Islamic Republic to find out if the world is any safer. (Final)
